caller_intent: The caller, Gabriel Martinez, was verifying bank account information associated with a policy and confirming details for a recurring payment setup in 2024.
resolution_steps: Agent Cody Jackson identified himself and asked for the insured name (Gabriel Martinez).
Asked for the checking account name linked to the policy, clarifying that only the last four digits of the account number could be confirmed.
Customer provided the last four digits (9561) and explained the account was used for EFD (Electronic Funds Debit) enrollment in 2024 and rolled over to the next renewal.
Agent acknowledged the information and committed to following up with a callback.
knowledge_required: Bank account verification processes for insurance policies
Understanding of EFD (Electronic Funds Debit) enrollment and renewal procedures
systems_referenced: Internal systems for checking account details
summary: Gabriel Martinez confirmed bank account details (last four digits: 9561) for a policy linked to an EFD setup in 2024. Agent Cody Jackson will follow up after verifying the information. The call included automated hold messages and a post-call survey prompt.
